I remember XMLUnit's tests were one affected, see
<http://github.com/Ke=
ntBeck/junit/issues/issue/9> and the thread that
lead to it as well as
<htt=
p://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/message.php?msg_name=3D20090531082343.B4FAA=
AB40C1%40vmgump.apache.org>

If you take svn revision 342 of XMLUnit it won=
't compile with Hamcrest
1.2 but with Hamcrest 1.1.  To see what I had to c=
hange to make things
work with Hamcrest 1.2:
<http://xmlunit.svn.sourceforg=
e.net/viewvc/xmlunit?view=3Drevision&revision=3D343>

Basically I had code =
like

Source s =3D ... code creating an instance of the Source interface ..=
.
assertThat(s, is(DOMSource.class))

and this is what happened

    [javac=
] /srv/gump/public/workspace/xmlunit/src/tests/java-core/net/sf/xmlunit/bui=
lder/InputTest.java:48: cannot find symbol
    [javac] symbol  : method ass=
ertThat(javax.xml.transform.Source,org.hamcrest.Matcher<capture#983 of ? su=
per javax.xml.transform.dom.DOMSource>)
    [javac] location: class net.sf.=
xmlunit.builder.InputTest
    [javac]         assertThat(s, is(DOMSource.cl=
ass));

in Hamcrest 1.1 the is method in question was

   public static Mat=
cher<Object> is(Class<?> type)

in 1.2 it became

   public static <T> Matc=
her<? super T> is(Class<T> type)

Together with

   public static <T> void =
assertThat(T actual, Matcher<T> matcher)

javac's type inferencer is runnin=
g into trouble.

The changed code in XMLUnit now uses 

assertThat(s, insta=
nceOf(DOMSource.class));

which was 

  public static Matcher<Object> insta=
nceOf(Class<?> type)

in Hamcrest 1.1 and became 

  public static <T> Matc=
her<T> instanceOf(Class<?> type)

The problem with the is() method is that =
it assumes a relation between
the class and the object you want to match at=
 compile time while the
instanceOf doesn't assume anything like this.

With=
 Hamcrest 1.2 you get a compile time error for

  assertThat("foo", is(Inte=
ger.class))

and with 1.1 you get a failed assertion.

Not sure if this is =
the problem David had in mind.
